DOC.brief_summary: We hypothesized that the multi-disciplinary assessment of interstitial lung disease patients would lead to a more accurate diagnosis and consequently alterations in treatment regimens that may lead to improved outcomes.
DOC.brief_title: The Role of Rheumatological Evaluation in the Management of Patients With Interstitial Lung Disease
DOC.criteria: Age above 18 years old ILD according to ATS/ERS guidelines Signed inform consent Previous lung surgery Other significant systemic disease
